title.rendered: STEDI 24 WATT LED TRACTOR FLOOD LIGHT

content.rendered:
New to our LED Work Light range is the 24w Tractor Flood Light. Designed to upgrade the factory fitted Halogen work lights found on most tractors that will directly replace through the same mounting style. Known compatibility is listed in the description.

WIDE FLOODCREE LED

WORK ALL NIGHT

OVERVIEW

The 24w Tractor LED Flood light will bring you into the modern age with a compatible fit with most tractor factory fittings and brighter light output with low power consumption.

PERFORMANCE

A dramatic increase over the factory halogen lighting up a wider area and an increased beam intensity allowing more visibility around your vehicle.

APPLICATION

These have a list of known compatibility with factory fittings but are also able to be installed at various locations around your vehicle. Not limited by tractor application as these are a useful companion to any work environment.

DETAILS

COMPATIBILTY:

Will fit all vehicles with U-Bracket factory fittings.

KEY FEATURES:

  • Flood Optics for a wide 40 degree spread pattern
  • 12 Volt and 24v Compatible
  • Waterproof Male & Female Deutsch connectors included
  • Stainless Steel Fittings
  • IP68 – Protected against immersion up to 3m in depth for no longer than 30 minutes at a time

SPECIFICATIONS

POWER 24 Watts
LEDS 8 x 3w LEDS
CURRENT DRAW 1.4a @ 13.6v
HOUSING MATERIAL Die Cast Aluminium
RAW LUMENS 1289Lm
INGRESS PROTECTION IP68
COLOUR TEMPERATURE 6000k
LIFE SPAN 50,000hrs
LENS Polycarbonate (PC) Lens
WEIGHT 0.660kgs
BEAM TYPE Flood

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 1 x 24 WATT LED Tractor Flood Light
  • Stainless Steel Universal U-Bracket
  • Wire Tails

excerpt.rendered:
STEDI 24 WATT LED TRACTOR FLOOD LIGHT

Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
